feed.title: Daily Update on Bappy’s Existence
feed.subtitle: Currently Existing @ Earth, Milky Way Galaxy, Local Group, Virgo Supercluster

entry.title: Why Have I Opened a Blog Site?

link.title: Why Have I Opened a Blog Site?

entry.content:
First of all, I am pretty bad at keeping journals(probably because I’m lazy). I write stuff in my journal for few days, then forget its existence for six months and rediscover that I have a journal. So, I thought writing a journal-like blog within the very device I study in everyday would be a good idea.
I have been working with Web App for quite sometime. I usually like to work with Node. But, I wanted to create a simple and personalized site. My friend Anirban’s site inspired me to create this. I decided to mess around with Ruby as a fun project. Jekyll seemed perfect for the job. It took a few hours to set up this static site.

I plan to post rants, takes on movies and tv shows, update my new favourite music albums every month and finally keep track of everything new I learn.

So, I thought writing a journal-like blog within the very device I study in everyday would be a good idea. I have been working with Web App for quite sometime. I usually like to work with Node. But, I wanted to create a simple and personalized site. My friend Anirban’s site inspired me to create this. I decided to mess around with Ruby as a fun project. Jekyll seemed perfect for the job. It took a few hours to set up this static site.
